column4: can anyone tell me why my gnome panel looks gray and lame like this screenshot: http://tinypic.com/r/1r6wjd/7   versus sexy in the images here: http://www.ubuntu.com/desktop     running ubuntu 10.10...  have tried changing gtk2 themes but the gnome panel won't change from its current look....
that changes the window titles and everything, but not the gnome panel =\
Have you tried removeing and adding the panel again?
